title: Ring-A-Lings
note: Another holiday favourite originating from Grammy Alyce.
instructions: Sift flour & salt together in bowl. Set aside. Cream butter with confectioners sugar until well blended. Stir in dry ingredients half at a time, blending well to make a soft dough. Add vanilla & stir through. Chill several hours or until firm enough to handle.
Roll dough into marble-sized balls. Place 2 in. apart on baking sheet. Make a hollow in center of each with thumb. Fill with jam or jelly (not too much – it will run over).
Bake in 300° oven for about 20 mins.
